articles.title: Kohl's shares jump after retailer enters exclusive sale talks with Franchise Group - CNBC
articles.description: Franchise Group is proposing to buy Kohl's for $60 per share.
articles.content:
Kohl's said Monday that it has entered into exclusive negotiations with retail holding company Franchise Group, which is proposing to buy the retailer for $60 per share.
Such a price tag would value… [+2153 chars]
